Featured Projects

Our most impactful work that transformed businesses and redefined digital experiences.

E-Commerce Revolution

TechCorp 3D Shopping Experience

Revolutionized online shopping with interactive 3D product visualization. Users can rotate, zoom, and interact with products in real-time, leading to a 145% increase in conversions.

Three.js WebGL React

Results: 145% increase in conversions, 67% reduction in returns, 234% increase in user engagement

Data Visualization

DigitalPlus Analytics Dashboard

Real-time data visualization platform with interactive 3D charts and smooth animations. Transformed complex data into intuitive, actionable insights.

D3.js Node.js MongoDB

Results: 78% increase in user engagement, 45% faster decision-making, 156% improvement in data comprehension
